alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 11:46AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...LINE OF THUNDERSTORMS EXTENDING FROM THATCHER TO THE UTAH BORDER SOUTH OF PRESTON MOVING SLOWLY SOUTHEAST INTO THE BEAR RIVER RANGE THROUGH 1245 PM MDT... At 1143 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms extending from near Thatcher to near Oneida Narrows Reservoir to near Lewiston, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 30 mph, occasional lightning, and brief moderate rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Preston, Franklin, Oneida Narrows Reservoir, Thatcher, Dayton, Weston, Minnetonka Cave, Mapleton, Mink Creek, Whitney, Riverdale, Emmigrant Summit and Niter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Oneida Narrows Reservoir, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Franklin, Eastern Oneida Region; Marsh and Arbon Highlands
